title: Personalized Science Learning Strategies Through Learner Engagement Profiling

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science core concepts and job-related scientific knowledge
context.additional_context: As working learners face challenges securing study time during work hours, the design must optimize smartphone-based learning activities.

learning_goals: Learners can develop personalized learning plans based on individual participation profiles generated through LMS data analysis
Learners can achieve over 80% target participation rate by engaging in non-real-time learning activities (video viewing/quiz participation/discussion board posts) at least three times weekly
Learners can lead scientific problem-solving activities at least five times within a learning community and earn peer evaluation scores of 4 points or higher (out of 5)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
